T02D1456:4b-1: shr'i tsakra sam bar garbha tattva siddhi /
T02D1456:4b-3: dpal 'khor lo snyom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa /
T02D1456:4b-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1456:4b-5: gang du thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1456:4b-6: kun rdzob don dam dbyer med rang bzhin can //
T02D1456:4b-7: bde dang stong pa 'dus pa'i ros gang ba'i //
T02D1456:4b-8: gnyug ma'i ye shes de la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1456:4b-9: gang zhig goms par gyur pas srid pa yi //
T02D1456:4b-10: btson rar dkris pa'i 'ching ba kun gcod pa //
T02D1456:4b-11: sems kyi dam pa rang rig rin chen mchog / gang la brten nas rtogs pa'i thabs bshad bya //
T02D1456:4b-12: drug dang brgyad gnyis bcu phrag gnyis dang lnga //
T02D1456:4b-13: bzhin rgyas mig yangs gzugs mdzes lang tsho ldan //
T02D1456:4b-14: dad dang thos dang snying rjes yid brgyan ma //
T02D1456:4b-15: skyabs song sems bskyed yang dag dbang bskur ba //
T02D1456:4b-16: nyes bral dben par g-yeng ba kun spangs te //
T02D1456:4b-17: khams dang rjes mthun bza' dang btung ba dang //
T02D1456:4b-18: dri zhim yid 'ong rgyan mdzes spyod dgu ldan //
T02D1456:4b-19: gang dang tha mal 'dzin pa rnams spangs te //
T02D1456:4b-20: dbang po'i gzhu ltar snang ba lha yi lus //
T02D1456:4b-21: de la yi ge dya ni sna rtse dang //
T02D1456:4b-22: byin pa mtshan gyi lte bar rnam dgod cing //
T02D1456:4b-23: lte ba snyid ga kha dang dpral ba ru //
T02D1456:4b-24: sngags kyi tshogs dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab //
T02D1456:4b-25: 'khyud dang 'o byed sen mos 'debs pa dang //
T02D1456:4b-26: mchu 'jib pa dang nu ma 'tshir ba dang //
T02D1456:4b-27: nyed dang rde ba dang sor mo bskyod pa yis //
T02D1456:4b-28: dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D1456:4b-29: gang tshe mnyam med rin chen mchog lta bu //
T02D1456:5a-0: sems kyi dam pa rang rig bde chen @5a * //
T02D1456:5a-2: / gang du rtogs pa de tshe srog rtsol ba //
T02D1456:5a-3: bkag pa'i sbyor pas bde chen ro myang bya //
T02D1456:5a-4: dngos dang dngos med mtha' gnyis rnam spangs shing //
T02D1456:5a-5: stong dang snying rje dbyer med rang bzhin can //
T02D1456:5a-6: dus gsum rgyal ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i rgyu //
T02D1456:5a-7: rang rig bde chen ye shes gcig pu pa //
T02D1456:5a-8: gnyug ma'i rang bzhin gang der mtshon par bya //
T02D1456:5a-9: gang du mtshon bya mtshon byed kyis mtshon pa //
T02D1456:5a-10: rnam shes ye shes nyid du mtshon pa dang //
T02D1456:5a-11: ye shes gang des shes byar snang ba yi //
T02D1456:5a-12: 'gro ba ma lus de kun der mtshon bya //
T02D1456:5a-13: de tshe dbang po'i yul du snang ba yang //
T02D1456:5a-14: gzugs sgra dri ro reg byar gyur pa yi //
T02D1456:5a-15: dngos po 'di kun ma lus bde chen po //
T02D1456:5a-16: gang du de las gzhan pa'i dngos med cing //
T02D1456:5a-17: bde chen ye shes zhes bya gcig pu pa //
T02D1456:5a-18: gcig pu'i nyams kyis du mar gar mdzad do //
T02D1456:5a-19: gang gis rang gi ye shes mchog bsgoms pas //
T02D1456:5a-20: srid pa'i 'ching ba ma lus kun bcad de //
T02D1456:5a-21: bdag gzhan nye bar 'tsho ba'i 'byung gnas kyis //
T02D1456:5a-22: mnyam med mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings la brten //
T02D1456:5a-23: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i snying po'i de kho na nyid grub pa /
